item.title: Using WinMerge as difftool on cygwin/git
item.description: Last couple of weeks i have been using Git on cygwin and i got very satisfying results out of it. One thing that i wanted to tweak was the ability to use WinMerge to compare files. Here is how i do it: Here is my ~/.gitconfig: [user] name = Tim Van Wassenhove email = git@timvw.be [diff] external = "~/bin/git-diff-wrapper.sh" Here is my ~/bin/git-diff-wrapper.sh (it uses cygpath to translate the paths):
